turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place a pickup order for Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, which Starbucks would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on route 23 in Franklin, NJ.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The one at 111 Rt. 23 South, Franklin, NJ 07416?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order me an iced salted caramel mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, Coconut, 2%, Nonfat, Whole, and Soy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Would you like whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I've placed your order. It will be ready for pickup shortly, and you will receive your receipt via text message.
